snippet: Diplomatic efforts to stop fighting in Syria foundered as President Bashar al-Assad shut the door on immediate negotiations and escalated a new assault on the city of Idlib.
abstract: High-level diplomatic efforts to stop the fighting in Syria yield mixed results as Pres Bashar al-Assad shuts the door on any immediate negotiations with the opposition and escalates a new military assault on the city of Idlib; Bashar tells United Nations envoy Kofi Annan that talks would be fruitless.
lead_paragraph: Diplomatic efforts to stop fighting in Syria foundered as President Bashar al-Assad shut the door on immediate negotiations and escalated a new assault on the city of Idlib.
